item.title: Apache Beam Local Development with Python - Part 1 Pipeline, Notebook, SQL and DataFrame
item.description: Apache Beam and Apache Flink are open-source frameworks for parallel, distributed data processing at scale. Flink has DataStream and Table/SQL APIs and the former has more capacity to develop sophisticated data streaming applications. The DataStream API of PyFlink, Flink’s Python API, however, is not as complete as its Java counterpart, and it doesn’t provide enough capability to extend when there are missing features in Python. Recently I had a chance to look through Apache Beam and found it supports more possibility to extend and/or customise its features.
